executable.title: BRAINS Quad Edge Mesh Similarity
executable.description: This program compares overlap between two label arrays on two input surfaces. Both Dice and Jaccard Indices are given for each label in the output .txt file. The average Dice and Jaccard Indices are added to the bottom lines of the output file, if the flag "Average" is ON.
executable.contributor: Wen Li and Luis Ibanez and Vincent Magnotta
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this work was provided by NIH/NINDS award NS050568
